rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with subtle decorative elements, incorporating local motifs and Vastu guidelines for proper ingress.
An open-plan living area that connects seamlessly to the kitchen. Features floor-to-ceiling windows on one side to enhance natural light, as per local aesthetic and Vastu principles.
Modern open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Equipped with high-quality appliances, ample storage, and floor-to-ceiling windows for ventilation and natural lighting.
Spacious master bedroom oriented according to Vastu principles, with a private balcony or adjoining garden space. Offers privacy and comfort.
Well-planned bedroom ensuring a calm environment, with access to natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows.
Additional bedroom, following local design norms and Vastu considerations for balanced energy flow.
Fourth bedroom ensuring adherence to space efficiency and proper room orientation according to Vastu guidelines.
Modern bathroom design with sufficient storage and ventilation, following local standards.
Dedicated utility space for laundry and storage, designed in accordance with building norms.

openings.description: Large garage door opening to accommodate two cars, ensuring ease of access and adherence to local safety standards.
Multiple window openings to ensure ample natural light and ventilation across all rooms.
Main entrance door designed for accessibility and security, incorporating local aesthetic values.

vastu_guidelines.entrance_orientation: North-Eastern direction is recommended for the main entrance to ensure positive energy flow.
vastu_guidelines.garage_positioning: Garage should ideally be located towards the west side of the plot, minimizing noise and disturbances.

local_building_norms.plot_utilization: Approximately 70% plot coverage to allow for sufficient open space as per local zoning regulations.
local_building_norms.material_requirements: Use locally sourced materials where possible, ensuring sustainability and adherence to local standards.
